USART_Clock

Defines

#define USART_Clock_Disable   ((uint16_t)0x0000)
#define USART_Clock_Enable   ((uint16_t)0x0800)
#define IS_USART_CLOCK(CLOCK)

Define Documentation

#define IS_USART_CLOCK (   CLOCK  ) 
Value:
(((CLOCK) == USART_Clock_Disable) || \
                               ((CLOCK) == USART_Clock_Enable))
